availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Tollivar Taliaferro Downard (Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary F. Cummins Downard in Bracken County, Kentucky, on September 26, 1859. Father of Abigail Downard and Laura Downard. Farm laborer in Bracken County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 424A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Berlin Township, p. 277A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Bracken County Marriages, p. 25-26.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #27191.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bracken County Marriages, Film #000344097.
